input.sentences: for my boyfriend 's 25th birthday | i got a lot of friends together .
i made him a very funky cake | with blue frosting and lots of dots .
he loved the cake . he 's a cake guy . a birthday is n't a birthday without cake for him .
i used my finger to decorate him with frosting .
i love it that he knows how to have fun !
output.sentences: Steve was having a birthday party with his friends and family.
Steve's friends and family lit the candles on his birthday cake.
Steve's friends and family sang "Happy Birthday" to him.
Steve pretended to be annoyed at the singing but was happy to be surrounded by close friends and family.
